issues.info: If you find any bugs, or have any feature requests, please post them on the github!

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Toggles this mod without having to disable it!

progressReq.name: Only Like With Progress
progressReq.description: Allows you to seperate which levels are automatically liked if you have progress on them!

progress.name: Classic Progress
progress.description: You can add progress requirements here for liking classic levels here!

percentMode.name: Percent
percentMode.description: Enabling this setting causes the mod to only automatically like levels you have surpassed a specific percent on!

normalMode.name: Use Normal Mode
normalMode.description: Checks the normal mode percent when liking a level.

practiceMode.name: Use Practice Mode
practiceMode.description: Checks the practice mode percent when liking a level.

plat.name: Platformer Progress
plat.description: You can add platformer requirements here for liking classic levels here! This will only count completions!

normalPlat.name: Normal Mode
normalPlat.description: Auto like platformer levels if you have completed them in normal mode.

practPlat.name: Practice Mode
practPlat.description: Auto like platformer levels if you have completed them in practice mode.
